step_feedback.feedback: Good job tightening your muscles and closing your fists. Try to keep your elbows a little straighter in this position.
Excellent! You opened your fingers and extended your arms well. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale.
Great work on the outward arm movement. Focus on keeping your wrists straighter as you extend.
You're doing well with the arm extension. Ensure your shoulders stay relaxed and down, not lifting up.
You're almost there! For the next repetitions, try to keep your wrists and elbows a bit more stable during the outward movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists tight and muscles engaged when bringing your arms in, and then relax as you open your hands and extend your arms out. Focus on smooth, controlled movements.
